promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic simple bear dark-type pokemon wearing ornate gemstones. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or bear. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gembrute, a a gigantic simple bear dark-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Blind, Ticking Terror. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bear", "dark" or "Gembrute". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, bear-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: In castle shadows, the colossal Gembrute lurks. Despite its lack of sight, it dominates its territory using a booming roar that echoes like a ticking time bomb.
